error.sqltext:
INSERT INTO user_guardian (
    id,
    role,
    first_name,
    last_name,
    email,
    contact_number,
    password,
    age,
    education,
    school,
    guardian_first_name,
    guardian_last_name,
    guardian_email,
    guardian_contact_number,
    relationship_to_user,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    address,
    types_of_ds,
    cdd_type,
    username,
    med_certificates,
    pwd_id,
    date_of_birth
) VALUES (
    :id,
    'User',
    :first_name,
    :last_name,
    :email,
    :contact_number,
    :password,
    :age,
    :education,
    :school,
    :guardian_first_name,
    :guardian_last_name,
    :guardian_email,
    :guardian_contact_number,
    :relationship,
    SYSDATE,
    SYSDATE,
    :address,
    :types_of_ds,
    :cdd_type,
    :username,
    :med_certificates,
    :pwd_id,
    CASE WHEN :birthdate IS NULL OR TRIM(:birthdate) = '' THEN NULL ELSE TO_DATE(:birthdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') END
)
